item.title: Adding Interactivity to Static Rmarkdown Documents
item.description: Overview Adding interactivity to data analytics outputs is a great tool to have in your toolkit. As an R User you have a few major output formats to choose from. However, itâ€™s not immediately obvious how much interactivity you can embed within each format.

item.title: Bulletin Edition 1 with Source
item.description:
Nah but actually The Intern was ok.
Much analysis has been completed regarding the performing peak of athletes and sportspeople. Statistically, swimmers peak at around 24, marathon runners between 30-31, gymnasts at a mere 18, NBA players generally peak between 26-29, professional hockey players between 27-28, and chess players at 30-35.
